Description: Tirio antique brass plating carving Hollow Skeleton Hand Wind Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: Half Hunter Pocket Watch Renaissance Antique LookSkeleton Dial with Hand Wind Mechanical Movement100% Brand New and High Quality!Metal Chain Length 365mm (14 inches)Nice gift for your father, your family or your friends Product Details: Product Dimensions: 3.3 x 3.1 x 1.5 inchesShipping Weight: 1.6 ounces Description Once you receive the mechanical watch: Setting time: Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Winding the watch: Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation till you feel tight.
